title: Pset_ZoneCommon
description: Properties common to the definition of all occurrences of IfcZone.

Reference.title: Reference
Reference.description: Reference ID for this specified type in this project (e.g. type 'A-1'). Used to store the non-classification driven internal project type.

IsExternal.title: IsExternal
IsExternal.description: Indication whether the element is designed for use in the exterior (TRUE) or not (FALSE). If (TRUE) it is an external zone at the outside of the building.

GrossPlannedArea.title: GrossPlannedArea
GrossPlannedArea.description: Total planned gross area for the zone. Used for programming the zone.

NetPlannedArea.title: NetPlannedArea
NetPlannedArea.description: Total planned net area for the zone. Used for programming the zone.

PubliclyAccessible.title: PubliclyAccessible
PubliclyAccessible.description: Indication whether this space (in case of e.g., a toilet) is designed to serve as a publicly accessible space, e.g., for a public toilet (TRUE) or not (FALSE).

HandicapAccessible.title: HandicapAccessible
HandicapAccessible.description: Indication whether this space (in case of e.g., a toilet) is designed to serve as an accessible space for handicapped people, e.g., for a public toilet (TRUE) or not (FALSE). This information is often used to declare the need for access for the disabled and for special design requirements of this space.
